pages.text: Indeed, my protector is Allah Who has revealed the book, and Who aids the pious
While those you invoke instead of Him have no power to help you! Nor can they help themselves
If you invite them towards the guidance, they will not hear. You think they are looking at you, but they do not see a thing
Be tolerant, and enjoin the right conduct. Turn away from the inane and ignorant ones
If Shaitan ever incites you to anger, then seek refuge with Allah. Indeed, He hears all, and knows all
Indeed, whenever an evil thought from Shaitan troubles them, the pious (always) remember (Allah). Then, they begin to see clearly
While Shaitans plunge their (evil doing) brothers deeper into deception and disobedience. Then they do not relent

When you do not bring them a miracle (of their liking) they say, "Why do you not bring us the miracle (we demand)?" Tell them, "In fact, I only follow what has been revealed to me by my Lord. This (Qur´an) is the proof from your Lord; it is the guidance and mercy for the nation that believes
Hush up, and listen attentively when the Qur´an is being recited. Perhaps, you would receive mercy
Each morning and evening, remember your Lord in your heart with humility and fear, and without raising your voice. Do not (ever) be among the neglectful and the unmindful
Those close to your Lord _ (the angels) _ are never too proud to worship Him. They chant His praises and fall prostrate before Him
